dmca.title: Book Reviewer Asks Google To Remove Links
dmca.body:
[private]
c/o ReviwsOfBooks.com 
[private] 
Waterville, VT 05492

July 26, 2004


Google, Inc.
Ann: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google,

I have discovered copyrighted material of my own on other web sites via your search engine. The work in question is my book review for The Da Vinci Code by Dan Brown which can be found at http://www.reviewsofbooks.com/da_vinci_code/review/. Note my byline: Review by [private]

If you type the following text into the Google web search engine:

da vinci code ricebitz

two sites are shown who have posted my review, word for word, complete with my byline. The web pages are

http://www.ricebitz.com/issue013/fried_rice/book.html 

http://www.tsinoy.com/Chopsuey/Reviews.cfin?ID=702

I can be reached by e-mail at [private]@[private].com

I emailed the administrators for ricebitz.com at [private]@[private].com and tsinoy.com at [private]
